message.body: did you RSVP for distrito?
thanks lauryn, for pointing out that the cast has to be available on the shoot day. saying "super long day" just to get everyone feeling good and excited
Ahahahahaha. Thought the same thing. Negative nancy!
I RSVPd to ensure free food/drinks. Haha
cayce thought we should link all the festivals on website. thanks for doing paypal!
That's a great idea! Yeah just need to discuss stuff with you maybe tmw when ur here
k sounds good. can you carry lenses?
I think I could. Backpack, lenses, lavs.
Probably not much more
ok cool. great we have the 5d! I wouldn't cancel yr reservation quite yet
I wants to print the manual but it's 400 pages!
yeah just don't really want to read it on phone
Just DL the PDF on you phone!
any word from brandon?
No response via email which is typical. Will text him tonight!
I guess he's not as crucial now that we have sound
are you getting xlr cables to connect lavs to mixer? and then we can record scratch track in camera?
and you have 2 extension cords? filling in production sheet. I think my 50' extension cord is kindof ridiculous to bring
I have two!
Will check out two XLRs too.
Are we going to use a mixer or boom into camera and lavs into recorder? No need for mixing them right? Maybe up to sound person. Is bring your zoom still just in case
I was thinking both lavs and boom would go into sound guy's mixer and camera could just record scratch to sync with internal mic?
Cool! I didn't look through his list obviously. That's a plan.
Ps. Have you checked the weather? Monday they say 6-12 inches with ice
Starts Sunday night
ugh
you think I should take the train?
Not sure yet. There's a lot of hype here but I'm not buying into it yet
